item.title: The Gareth Pon Interview
item.description:
The Gareth Pon Interview

Words: Genevieve Putter | Photographs: Chisanga Mubanga As a freelance writer, I have a confession to make... my shorthand blows. Ironic as interviewing prolific people is a big part of my schtick.

item.title: Social Media has become a marketing tool - Moneyweb
item.description:
Social Media has become a marketing tool - Moneyweb

Interview with Samsung brand ambassador and South African Instagrammer Gareth Pon about social media as a marketing tool. Morgan Barnard | 4 August 2015 16:58 http://www.moneyweb.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/150804-garethpon.mp3 MORGAN BARNARD: Hello and welcome to Moneyweb's special report podcast. My name is Morgan Barnard.
